name: AI Chatbot
description: A lightweight conversational AI chatbot built with Python that demonstrates NLP text generation and interactive chatting.

name: Image Classification Model
description: Deep learning-based image classifier using TensorFlow/PyTorch with a web demo and prediction output.

name: Audio Classifier
description: A simple audio event detection model with spectrogram visualization and prediction results.

name: Object Detection (Vision)
description: YOLO-based object detection model demo showcasing bounding boxes, labels, and real-time inference.

name: Text Summarizer
description: An AI-powered text summarization tool that condenses long content into short summaries using transformer models.
